member.name: T:LBPLibrary.Functions
member.summary: Contains utility functions that are used in calculating LBP images.

member.name: M:LBPLibrary.Functions.GetSubMatrix``1(``0[0:,0:],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Get submatrix from 2D matrix. Gets smaller submatrix using given limit indices. Equal to Matlab operation matrix(ylim1:ylim2, xlim1:xlim2)

member.name: M:LBPLibrary.Functions.ArrayPadding``1(``0[0:,0:],System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Pads image by extending border pixels. Give "Reflect" as method string if you want to reflect array borders. Nearest = extend edge values

member.name: T:LBPLibrary.LBPApplication
member.summary: LBP application class object. Used to calculate Median Robust Extended Local Binary Pattern or LBP from images.

member.name: M:LBPLibrary.LBPApplication.PipelineLBP(System.Double[0:,0:],LBPLibrary.Parameters,System.Double[0:,0:]@,System.Int32[]@)
member.summary: Calculates LBP from 2D array Enter array, radius and neighbours.

member.name: M:LBPLibrary.LBPApplication.PipelineMRELBP(System.Double[0:,0:],LBPLibrary.Parameters,System.Double[0:,0:]@,System.Double[0:,0:]@,System.Double[0:,0:]@,System.Int32[]@,System.Int32[]@,System.Int32[]@,System.Int32[]@)
member.summary: Calculates MRELBP from 2D array Enter array and parameters class including small and large radius, neighbours and kernel weights. Weights are for center pixels (w_c), small (w_r[0]) and large (w_r[1]) radius.

member.name: M:LBPLibrary.LBPApplication.Scaling
member.summary: Scales array by mean and standard deviation.

member.name: M:LBPLibrary.LBPApplication.FilterImage
member.summary: Performs median filtering for images and calculates center histogram.

member.name: M:LBPLibrary.LBPApplication.GetMapping
member.summary: Gets rotation invariant uniform mapping for neighbours

member.name: T:LBPLibrary.MedianFilter
member.summary: Performs median filtering on given arrays. Kernel size has to be given.

member.name: T:LBPLibrary.LocalStandardization
member.summary: Performs grayscale standardization for images. Standardizes by gaussian mean with given gernels and std:s.

member.name: T:LBPLibrary.Parameters
member.summary: Class variable that contains necessary parameters for running LBP calculations and running the demo application. Initializes default values.

member.name: T:LBPLibrary.RunLBP
member.summary: Class that is used to call different LBP pipelines for single image or image batches. Takes in the Parameters class variable.

member.name: M:LBPLibrary.RunLBP.CalculateSingle
member.summary: Calculate single LBP image. For LBP image, path and savepath should be defined first. For MRELBP image meanpath, stdpath and savepath should be defined first.

member.name: M:LBPLibrary.RunLBP.CalculateBatch
member.summary: Calculate all images from given path directory with selected extension. Savepath sould also be defined.
